Description: Deep bowl of pale brown pottery: with dull red paint on all surfaces. The base is flattened but remains very slightly convex, and the sides turn inwards at the rim. Good condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. B. Emery, 'Excavations at Saqqara : the tomb of Hemaka' (Cairo, 1938), 50, type 14 and pl. 27, type 14.
